generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.verbatim:

generic: Track and mention modifications in the source code
obligations.name: Marking modifications
obligations.verbatim: 2. Altered versions must be plainly marked as such and must not be misrepresented as being the original source.
